posts.post_content:
Hello I have a few t206's for trade. They can be seen in the sale/trade section provided in my signature link at the bottom. I have Waddell throwing, Chase Blue (Sov 460), Chase Throwing (Sov 150), Myers, and Oldring.

I would like to try trading for pre-war Red Sox issues first but feel free to make offers.
                                       Thanks,
                                         Steve
